data.name: Connect_Info_File_Rescue_001
data.value: Even if you can't connect to your partner,[pause=10] you can still do rescues with File Rescue.

data.name: Connect_Info_File_Rescue_002
data.value: When someone wipes out in a dungeon,[pause=10] a .sosmail file will appear in RESCUE/OUTBOX/SOS.

data.name: Connect_Info_File_Rescue_003
data.value: Have them send it to you,[pause=10] and place it in RESCUE/INBOX/SOS.

data.name: Connect_Info_File_Rescue_004
data.value: From there,[pause=10] you'll be able to do the rescue like you would normally.

data.name: Connect_Info_File_Rescue_005
data.value: After you've completed the mission,[pause=10] a .aokmail file will appear in RESCUE/OUTBOX/AOK.

data.name: Connect_Info_File_Rescue_006
data.value: Send it back to your partner,[pause=10] and have them place it in RESCUE/OUTBOX/AOK.

data.name: Connect_Info_File_Rescue_007
data.value: From there,[pause=10] they'll be able to continue their adventure!

data.name: Connect_Info_File_Rescue_008
data.value: However,[pause=10] keep in mind that you cannot receive rewards with this method.

data.name: Connect_Info_P2P_005
data.value: Then,[pause=10] configure your server settings use your friend's IP.

data.name: Connect_Info_Rescue_001
data.value: Friend Rescues are rescue missions between friends over the Internet.

data.name: Connect_Info_Rescue_002
data.value: If your friend wiped out in a dungeon,[pause=10] you could play the hero and come to their rescue!

data.name: Connect_Info_Rescue_003
data.value: Connect to a friend who was KO'd in a dungeon,[pause=10] and you will receive an SOS Mail.

data.name: Connect_Info_Rescue_004
data.value: When you get that mail,[pause=10] you can start a rescue mission at the counter to your right.

data.name: Connect_Info_Rescue_005
data.value: If you complete the mission,[pause=10] connect to your friend again to send them an A-OK Mail.

data.name: Connect_Info_Rescue_006
data.value: Once they get that mail,[pause=10] they can continue from where they fainted in that dungeon.

data.name: Connect_Info_Rescue_007
data.value: Just remember,[pause=10] you can only rescue friends if they're in dungeons you can access.

data.name: Connect_Intro
data.value: Hello there, this is the Connectivity counter. What can I help you with today?

data.name: Rescue_Intro
data.value: Hello, I handle mail! How may I serve you?

data.name: Connect_Info_Friends_001
data.value: To connect with friends,[pause=10] first choose a server to communicate on.

data.name: Connect_Info_Friends_002
data.value: Then,[pause=10] exchange Team IDs with your friend to add them to your contact list.

data.name: Connect_Info_Friends_003
data.value: Once added,[pause=10] you can choose to rescue or trade with them.

data.name: Connect_Info_P2P_001
data.value: Normally,[pause=10] communicating with a friend requires both players to connect to the same server.

data.name: Connect_Info_P2P_002
data.value: If you can't find a server that is online,[pause=10] you can't connect to your friend.

data.name: Connect_Info_P2P_003
data.value: But by connecting peer-to-peer,[pause=10] you won't need a server!

data.name: Connect_Info_P2P_004
data.value: First,[pause=10] you must exchange IP addresses with your partner. Be sure to give your IP only to trusted people.

data.name: Connect_Info_P2P_007
data.value: Most importantly,[pause=10] you must forward the port to connect properly.

data.name: Connect_Info_P2P_008
data.value: Once you've set everything up,[pause=10] you can connect to your partner like normal.

data.name: Connect_Info_Trade_Item_002
data.value: Items are traded from storage,[pause=10] and up to 8 can be sent at a time.

data.name: Connect_Info_Trade_Mail_002
data.value: Be aware that when the mission is no longer in your hands,[pause=10] you will lose track of the Pokémon requesting it.

data.name: Connect_Info_Trade_Team_002
data.value: Send them abroad to your friend's team,[pause=10] and they'll send one of their members in return.

data.name: Connect_Info_Trade_Team_003
data.value: When sent in,[pause=10] they'll be treated like any other Pokémon that joined your team.

data.name: Connect_Info_Trade_Team_004
data.value: Just remember,[pause=10] Pokémon important to the team can't be sent over.

data.name: Rescue_Info_File_Rescue_001
data.value: Even if you can't connect to your partner,[pause=10] you can still do rescues with File Rescue.

data.name: Rescue_Info_File_Rescue_002
data.value: When someone wipes out in a dungeon,[pause=10] a .sosmail file will appear in RESCUE/OUTBOX/SOS.

data.name: Rescue_Info_File_Rescue_003
data.value: Have them send it to you,[pause=10] and place it in RESCUE/INBOX/SOS.

data.name: Rescue_Info_File_Rescue_004
data.value: From there,[pause=10] you'll be able to do the rescue like you would normally.

data.name: Rescue_Info_File_Rescue_005
data.value: After you've completed the mission,[pause=10] a .aokmail file will appear in RESCUE/OUTBOX/AOK.

data.name: Rescue_Info_File_Rescue_006
data.value: Send it back to your partner,[pause=10] and have them place it in RESCUE/INBOX/AOK.

data.name: Rescue_Info_File_Rescue_007
data.value: From there,[pause=10] they'll be able to continue their adventure!

data.name: Rescue_Info_File_Rescue_008
data.value: However,[pause=10] keep in mind that you cannot receive rewards with this method.

data.name: Rescue_Info_Rescue_002
data.value: If your friend wiped out in a dungeon,[pause=10] you could play the hero and come to their rescue!

data.name: Rescue_Info_Rescue_003
data.value: On the counter to your left,[pause=10] connect to a friend who was KO'd in a dungeon.

data.name: Rescue_Info_Rescue_004
data.value: You will receive an SOS Mail,[pause=10] and then you can start a rescue mission at this counter.

data.name: Rescue_Info_Rescue_005
data.value: If you complete the mission,[pause=10] connect to your friend again to send them an A-OK Mail.

data.name: Rescue_Info_Rescue_007
data.value: Just remember,[pause=10] you can only rescue friends if they're in dungeons you can access.

data.name: Rescue_Return_Fail_001
data.value: Oh no,[pause=10] your rescue attempt went badly...

data.name: Rescue_Return_Miss_003
data.value: Always remember,[pause=10] the mission isn't completed until you reach the rescue goal.

data.name: Connect_Info_P2P_006
data.value: You and your partner must also specify the same port. If left blank,[pause=10] the port defaults to 1705.

data.name: Rescue_Info_Rescue_006
data.value: Once they get that mail,[pause=10] they can continue from where they fainted in that dungeon.
